name: Galarian Stunfisk
description: Living in mud with a high iron content has given it a strong steel body.

abilities.name: Snap Trap
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if it is Knocked Out), discard an Energy from the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Damage Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.
